name: Where are the Others?
description:
You've landed on a strange planet after receiving a distress call...

but your welcome party hasn't arrived. What happened here? What happened to them?

Where are the others?

Controls Keyboard + MouseXBOX GampadMoveWASD or Arrow KeysLeft StickLook (Aim)MouseRight StickJumpSpacebarACycle Weapons1, 2 Keys or Mouse WheelLB, RBFireLeft ClickRT
